metadata.title: CVE-2019-10206 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ansible-playbook -k and ansible cli tools, all versions 2.8.x before 2.8.4, all 2.7.x before 2.7.13 and all 2.6.x before 2.6.19, prompt passwords by expanding them from templates as they could contain special characters. Passwords should be wrapped to prevent templates trigger and exposing them.

notes.note: ebarretto> Be careful when applying the fix as it might lead to CVE-2019-14856

criterions.comment: ansible package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.6+dfsg-1').
